column4: how can i find out which driver i have installed for my display?
hmm ok so i see a nvidia, uvesafb, vesafb, and video. Does that mean I'm using proprietary or default?

I don't have a machine with an nVidia card to check right now but I think you need the nouveau driver... here's the step-by-step from Ubuntu: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/Nvidia
